title: Evaluating Presentation Success
text: Consider how you can best gauge if your message is getting through to your audience.

title: Measuring Understanding
text: Seeing if your audience recall your message can tell you about how your presentation performed.

title: Others Presenting
text: It might not be the most effective to have other people unfamiliar with the presentation to test present it.

title: Judgement of Quality
text: Having others judge the quality of the presentation without rehearsing it will not be an accurate measure of what the presentation conveys.
